text: House of Liu was the ruling house of the Han dynasty (206 BC–9 AD, 25–220 AD) and Shu Han (221–263). House of Liu may also refer to: *The ruling house of Former Zhao (304–329) *The ruling house of Xia (407–431) *The ruling house of the Liu Song dynasty (420–479) *The ruling house of Southern Han (917–971) *The ruling house of Later Han (947–951) and Northern Han (951–979)
title: House of Liu (disambiguation)
